channel.title: Access 2000's Easter Egg
channel.description:
This Is A Funny Little Extra That Microsoft Included With Access 2000. It Will ONLY WORK WITH Access 2000.
1: Open A New Database With Access 2000 2: Create A New Macro 3: Dont Do Anything, Just Immediately Save It As "Magic Eight Ball" (case sensitive, dont include the qoutations) 4: Close The Macro 5: Droag The Macro On To The Tool Bar
Notice Anything? The Macro Icon Has Turned To An Eight Ball! Ask A Question Out Loud And Then Click On It!
Hope You Enjoy Using It!

item.title: Access 2000's Easter Egg
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

This Is A Funny Little Extra That Microsoft Included With Access 2000. It Will ONLY WORK WITH Access 2000.

1: Open A New Database With Access 2000
2: Create A New Macro
3: Dont Do Anything, Just Immediately Save It As “Magic Eight Ball” (case sensitive, dont include the qoutations)
4: Close The Macro
5: Droag The Macro On To The Tool Bar

Notice Anything? The Macro Icon Has Turned To An Eight Ball! Ask A Question Out Loud And Then Click On It!

Hope You Enjoy Using It!

Read full topic
